lyrics.lyric: The Lazy Song
today I don't feel like doing anything
I just wanna lay in my bed
don't feel like picking up my phone
so leave a message at the tone
cause today I swear I'm not doing anything
lyrics.tlyric: 因为今天我发誓啥事都不做

lyrics.lyric: I'm gonna kick my feet up and stare at the fan
lyrics.tlyric: 把脚翘高高，呆望电风扇

lyrics.lyric: turn the TV on, throw my hands in my pants
nobody's gone tell me I can't
now I'll be lounging on the couch just chillin' in my Snuggie
lyrics.tlyric: 我就窝在沙发里，缩在懒人毯里

lyrics.lyric: click to MTV so they can teach me how to Dougie
lyrics.tlyric: 打开MTV，看看他们怎么教我跳Dougie舞

lyrics.lyric: cause in my castle I'm the freaking man
lyrics.tlyric: 因为在我地盘我说了算

lyrics.lyric: oooh yes I said
I said it
I said it 'cause I can
lyrics.tlyric: 因为我可以，所以我能说

lyrics.lyric: today I don't feel like doing anything
I just wanna lay in my bed
don't feel like picking up my phone
so leave a message at the tone
cause today I swear I'm not doing anything
lyrics.tlyric: 因为今天我发誓啥事都不做

lyrics.lyric: nothing at all
nothing at all
tomorrow I'll wake up do some P90X, meet a really nice girl
lyrics.tlyric: 明天起床做做P90X，约一个超棒的女孩

lyrics.lyric: have some really nice sex
and she's gonna scream out this is great
（oh this is great）
yeeah I might mess around and get my college degree
lyrics.tlyric: 我可能会瞎搞搞，拿到我的大学学位

lyrics.lyric: I bet my old man will be so proud of me
lyrics.tlyric: 我打赌老爸一定以我为荣

lyrics.lyric: but sorry pops, you'll just have to wait
lyrics.tlyric: 但抱歉啦，老爸，你还得再等等

lyrics.lyric: ooooh yes I said it
I said it
I said it 'cause I can
lyrics.tlyric: 因为我可以，所以我能说

lyrics.lyric: today I don't feel like doing anything
I just wanna lay in my bed
don't feel like picking up my phone
so leave a message at the tone
cause today I swear I'm not doing anything
lyrics.tlyric: 因为今天我发誓啥事都不做

lyrics.lyric: no, I ain't gonna comb my hair
lyrics.tlyric: 不，我不想整理我的头发

lyrics.lyric: cause I ain't going anywhere
I'll just strut in my birthday suit
and let everything hang loose
oh Today I don't feel like doing anything
I just wanna lay in my bed
don't feel like picking up my phone
so leave a message at the tone
cause today I swear I'm not doing anything
lyrics.tlyric: 因为今天我发誓啥事都不做

lyrics.lyric: nothing at all
nothing at all
nothing at all
